## ``argonDropNavItem``

Create a Boostrap 4 dashboard dropdown menu item

#### Description

Build an argon dashboard dropdown menu item

#### Usage
<pre><code>

argonDropNavItem(title = NULL, src = NULL, icon = NULL)

</code></pre>

#### Arguments

* ``title``: Item title.
* ``src``: External link.
* ``icon``: Icon name, if any.
